All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Authentication
Handle authentication of users on login page
AuthenticationController
Handle user actions on authentication page
CartController
Handles user actions on cart page (when creating a new order)
createMultipleOrderRequests
 
createOrderRequest
Class to store information about new order
Credentials
Store user's password separately for security purposes
dbExec
This class is used to make requests to the database and send results back to the front-end to show the results.
dbSetup
 
ErrorController
Handles error popup and associated user actions
ExcessController
Handles user actions on excess reports page
Ingredient
Store ingredients present per item per order
Inventory
Store entire inventory of ingredients, as well as load them into the database
InventoryController
Handles user actions on inventory page
Item
Store items present per order
jdbcpostgreSQL
 
Main
 
Manager
Store all functionality that a manager can do, and would ever want to do from their screen
ManagerController
Handles user actions on manager page
Menu
Store all items in menu, as well as handle adding items and ingredients to database
MenuController
Handles user actions on menu page
MenuIngredientController
Handles user action on menu ingredient page (adding a new item to the menu and linking ingredients)
Order
Store all information about an order
queries
 
ReportsController
Handles user action on reports page
RestockReportController
Handles user action on restock report page
SalesController
Handles user action on the sales report page
Server
Store all functionality a server is capable of performing from their screen
ServerController
Handles user actions on server page (adding new orders)
StartController
Handles user actions on home page
User
Store information about a user, such as ID, name, and type
UserType
Static class to differentiate between servers and managers
